GraphDoc documentation

GraphDoc is a tool for generating GraphQL documentation given a GraphQL schema. It is coupled with tooling for interacting with MLflow for tracking and logging. At the root of the graphdoc directory, you will find a mlflow-manager directory that can help you setup and manage a local MLflow server. Within the graphdoc directory, you will find a run.sh script that can help you get started with a majority of common workflows that you may want to run. Just reach open an issue, or submit a PR, if you have any questions or feedback. Thanks!
